title: Mziiki - Music for Africa
description:
Mziiki is the only music streaming app designed to deliver the true African music spirit. With a buzzing community of artists, we bring you an extension of music consisting of the latest hits & classics from Africa’s most talented musicians.
Mziiki provides you with more than the ability to download & listen to your favorite tracks, you can share them with other music lovers too! #ListenLoveShare
MZIIKI’S AMAZING FEATURES
•	Listen to your favorite African music via download and streaming.
•	Offline downloads of your favorite tracks- Reduce your data costs by downloading and listening to your favorite songs even without connectivity.
•	Create playlists from your favorite tracks for easy listening anytime.
•	Share your favorite songs with your friends and family.
•	Self-publishing portal enabling artists to upload their own music
GET IT NOW
•	Download the Mziiki App to enjoy the best Instrumental, Reggae, Hip Hop, Rock, Traditional African, Gospel, Genre hits from South Africa, Kenya, Tanzania & Nigeria.
JOIN THE COMMUNITY
Check us out on social media for the latest song updates and feel free to share with us your feedback on the App
•	Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mziiki
•	Twitter: https://twitter.com/Mziiki
•	Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mziiki
